pages.text: Dyeing certain items has always had a bit of a limitation in terms of the colors you can make - you're limited to the colors of the dyes you can find, and how many you can fit in a crafting grid at once.$(br2)Now that you have access to all of the elemental ink colors, why not use those to dye your items instead?

pages.title: Recipe
pages.text: Each print costs $(c_white)100 White Ink$() plus however much of the other inks you specify.
